languages.text: Ксенос — смертельный враг каждого подданного Империума. Любой человек, проявивший неуместное милосердие или даже еретический интерес к этим подлым чужакам, очень быстро начинает жалеть об этом.

traits.locale_text: Ксенос — смертельный враг каждого подданного Империума. Любой человек, проявивший неуместное милосердие или даже еретический интерес к этим подлым чужакам, очень быстро начинает жалеть об этом.

languages.text: Xenos are the mortal enemy of every subject of the Imperium. Any human who displays inappropriate sympathy for or even heretical interest in these foul aliens will very quickly come to regret it.
languages.original_text: Ксенос — смертельный враг каждого подданного Империума. Любой человек, проявивший неуместное милосердие или даже еретический интерес к этим подлым чужакам, очень быстро начинает жалеть об этом.

traits.locale_text: Xenos are the mortal enemy of every Imperial subject. Any human who displays inappropriate sympathy for or even heretical interest in these foul aliens will very quickly come to regret it.
Xenos are the mortal enemy of every Imperial subject. Any human who displays inappropriate sympathy for or even heretical interest in these foul aliens will very quickly come to regret it.
Xenos are the mortal enemy of every Imperial subject. Any human who displays inappropriate sympathy for or even heretical interest in these foul aliens will very quickly come to regret it.
Xenos are the mortal enemy of every subject of the Imperium. Any human who displays inappropriate sympathy for or even heretical interest in these foul aliens will very quickly come to regret it.

languages.text: Les xénos sont les ennemis mortels de tous les sujets de l'Imperium. Tout humain qui témoigne la moindre sympathie inappropriée, ou même un intérêt considéré comme hérétique, pour ces répugnantes créatures non-humaines ne tarde pas à le regretter.
languages.original_text: Xenos are the mortal enemy of every subject of the Imperium. Any human who displays inappropriate sympathy for or even heretical interest in these foul aliens will very quickly come to regret it.

traits.locale_text: Les xénos sont les ennemis mortels de tous les sujets de l'Imperium. Tout humain qui témoigne la moindre sympathie inappropriée, ou même un intérêt considéré comme hérétique, pour ces répugnantes créatures non-humaines ne tarde pas à le regretter.

languages.text: Los xenos son enemigos mortales de todos los súbditos del Imperium. Cualquier humano que muestre una simpatía indebida o, peor, un interés herético por esos abominables alienígenas no tardará en arrepentirse.
languages.original_text: Xenos are the mortal enemy of every subject of the Imperium. Any human who displays inappropriate sympathy for or even heretical interest in these foul aliens will very quickly come to regret it.

traits.locale_text: Los xenos son enemigos mortales de todos los súbditos del Imperium. Cualquier humano que muestre una simpatía indebida o, peor, un interés herético por esos abominables alienígenas no tardará en arrepentirse.

languages.text: 異種族は帝国のすべての臣民の宿敵である。この穢れた異星人に不適切な同情を示したり、異端的な関心を抱いたりする人間は、すぐに後悔することになるだろう。
languages.original_text: Xenos are the mortal enemy of every subject of the Imperium. Any human who displays inappropriate sympathy for or even heretical interest in these foul aliens will very quickly come to regret it.

traits.locale_text: 異種族は帝国のすべての臣民の宿敵である。この穢れた異星人に不適切な同情を示したり、異端的な関心を抱いたりする人間は、すぐに後悔することになるだろう。

languages.text: 异形是所有帝国臣民的死敌。若是有任何臣民对这些邪恶异形表现出不恰当的同情或兴趣，那些人很快会为他们的异端行径付出代价。
languages.original_text: Xenos are the mortal enemy of every subject of the Imperium. Any human who displays inappropriate sympathy for or even heretical interest in these foul aliens will very quickly come to regret it.

traits.locale_text: 异形是所有帝国臣民的死敌。若是有任何臣民对这些邪恶异形表现出不恰当的同情或兴趣，那些人很快会为他们的异端行径付出代价。

languages.text: Xenos sind die Todfeinde aller Bewohner des Imperiums. Jeder Mensch, der unangemessene Sympathie oder ketzerisches Interesse für diese widerlichen Aliens zeigt, wird es rasch bereuen.
languages.original_text: Xenos are the mortal enemy of every subject of the Imperium. Any human who displays inappropriate sympathy for or even heretical interest in these foul aliens will very quickly come to regret it.

traits.locale_text: Xenos sind die Todfeinde aller Bewohner des Imperiums. Jeder Mensch, der unangemessene Sympathie oder ketzerisches Interesse für diese widerlichen Aliens zeigt, wird es rasch bereuen.

languages.text: Zenolar, İmparatorluk'un her kulunun ölümcül düşmanlarıdır. Bu iğrenç ötesi uzaylılara karşı uygunsuz bir sempati ve hatta kâfirce ilgi besleyen herhangi bir insan, çok geçmeden bu yaptığına pişman olur.
languages.original_text: Xenos are the mortal enemy of every subject of the Imperium. Any human who displays inappropriate sympathy for or even heretical interest in these foul aliens will very quickly come to regret it.
